    • guessMove

      public int guessMove(Board curBoard)
      Start calculating the move after 1 second of switching turns.
      Parameters:
      curBoard - the board on which players are playing.
      Returns:
      the move state: 0 is not finished calculating, 1 is finished calculating and made the move.
